title: 275 - Pissosity
description:
Loyalty is an important component in successful business relationships. In this episode, the guys discuss the two sides of loyalty—physical loyalty vs. the kind of collaborative business loyalty that goes above and beyond. ET made it clear that, "Running a business is deeper than just making money. Look at it from the standpoint of the impact you've made and are making on people and the world around you."
 Listener Perks
  Organifi is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
